title: 3 and Out - Kyler Study Time, QB Tiers, Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Kyler Study Time, QB Tiers, Mailbag
description:
John explains why Kyler Murray’s mandatory film study clause in his new extension is major concern, gives his thoughts on the annual preseason QB tier rankings, and what the Packers extending Matt LaFleur and GM Brian Gutekunst says about Mike McCarthy. He also answers listener questions in the Middlekauff Mailbag.

Subscribe NOW and follow Middlekauff and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content. It's always FanDuel for the best wagering action! #herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
